mapper.select: SELECT "returnId","orderDetailId","returnDate","returnPrice","returnText", "startDate","endDate","stateType" FROM( SELECT "returnId","orderDetailId","returnDate","returnPrice","returnText", "startDate","endDate","stateType", ROWNUM AS rnum FROM ( select r.return_id AS "returnId", r.order_detail_id AS "orderDetailId", r.return_date AS "returnDate", r.return_price AS "returnPrice", r.return_text AS "returnText", od.start_date as "startDate", od.end_date as "endDate", od.state_type as "stateType" from return r join order_detail od ON r.order_detail_id = od.order_detail_id ) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY "returnId"
select return_id FROM return where return_id = #{returnId}
mapper.update: update order_detail od join return r on od.order_detail_id = r.order_detail_id set od.state_type = 5 where r.return_id = #{returnId};

SELECT od.order_id as "orderId", od.contract_id as "contractId", od.order_count as "orderCount", od.start_date as "startDate", od.end_date as "endDate", od.state_type as "stateType", o.order_name as "orderName", o.order_address as "orderAddress", o.order_content as "orderContent", o.order_price as "orderPrice", o.rental_price as "rentalPrice", o.order_date as "orderDate", o.request_date as "requestDate", p.product_model as "productModel", p.product_name as "productName", c.contract_year as "contractYear", c.contract_price as "contractPrice", u.user_phone as "userPhone", r.return_id AS "returnId", r.order_detail_id AS "orderDetailId", r.return_date AS "returnDate", r.return_price AS "returnPrice", r.return_text AS "returnText" FROM return r INNER JOIN order_detail od ON od.order_detail_id = r.order_detail_id INNER JOIN orders o ON o.order_id = od.order_id INNER JOIN product p ON p.product_id = od.product_id INNER JOIN contract c ON c.contract_id = od.contract_id INNER JOIN users u ON u.user_id = o.user_id WHERE r.return_id = #{returnId}
SELECT order_detail_id FROM return WHERE return_id = #{return_id}

SELECT s.schedule_id AS "scheduleId", s.visit_date AS "visitDate", s.visit_cycle AS "visitCycle", s.visit_type AS "visitType", s.visit_state AS "visitState", s.staff_id AS "staffId", s.user_id AS "userId", s.order_id AS "orderId", s.order_detail_id AS "order_detail_id", f.work_place AS "workPlace", f.work_status AS "workStatus", u.user_name AS "userName", ua.authority_name AS "authorityName"
FROM schedule s INNER JOIN staff f ON f.staff_id = s.staff_id INNER JOIN users u ON u.user_id = f.user_id LEFT JOIN user_authority ua ON ua.user_id = u.user_id AND ua.authority_name = 'ROLE_DRIVER' WHERE s.order_detail_id = #{orderDetailId}
